title: To strengthen warning labels on smokeless tobacco products.
content: Smokeless Tobacco Warning Label Act - Amends the Comprehensive Smokeless Tobacco Health Education Act of 1986 to revise smokeless tobacco product warning label requirements. Includes among alternative warning statements: (1) Smokeless Tobacco Is Addictive. And (2) This Product Contains Cancer Causing Chemicals. States that the Secretary of Health and Human Services may by rule revise such required statements.
